Thanks for the reply, we do not offer much up in the way of assisting you finding your first contract; I will however tell you that 90% of consultants find their first project through their natural market. Formulate a really amazing message that you can send to your colleauges, peers, contacts informing them of what you do and that you are looking for work; the activity that spawns from that will usually end up in your first contract.
It goes against the thinking that you’ll find the first contract through a job board or some other service; but it is how it usually works out. If you still find trouble finding a contract; you can always try and work through a staffing firm that specializes in the type of skills you have and telling them up-front you want to work 1099 versus as an employee of them.
Good luck and I hope you find something. As soon as you do, is a great time to reach out to me for how to process it.
Regards,
Steve
